Module com.example.cab302assessment10b0101
Package com.example.cab302assessment10b0101.model

Class Loan

java.lang.Object
com.example.cab302assessment10b0101.model.Loan
public class Loan extends Object
The Loan class represents a loan record in the system. It stores information about the user, borrower, borrowed book, and loan date. This class uses JavaFX property bindings to allow the data to be easily bound to UI elements.

    • Loan

      public Loan(int userId, String borrowerName, String borrowerContact, Book book, LocalDate date)
      Constructor to create a new Loan instance with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user who owns the loan.
      borrowerName - The name of the borrower.
      borrowerContact - The contact details of the borrower.
      book - The book associated with the loan.
      date - The date when the loan was made.
